tasks.label: backend: dev
args: cd "${workspaceFolder}/backend"; if (!(Test-Path .venv)) { python -m venv .venv }; .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1; pip install -r requirements.txt; uvicorn app:app --reload --port 8000

tasks.label: frontend: dev
args: cd "${workspaceFolder}/frontend"; if (!(Test-Path node_modules)) { npm install }; if (!(Test-Path .env)) { Copy-Item .env.example .env }; npm run dev
